document_data.name: House Helviiryn
document_data.Activities: A member of House Helviiryn was the [[Master of Alteration]] and a member of the [[Conclave of Ssamath]].
document_data.Known Members of House Helviiryn:
* [[Shurdriira Helviiryn]], a prominent [[mage]] in [[Sshamath]]
* [[Thirza Helviiryn]], a consort who was stationed in [[Undermountain]]<ref name ="WDMM-p64">
